array.name: temple_description
array.item: Perched on a hilltop, this ancient Hindu temple honors Mansa Devi, the folk goddess of snakes.
Historic Hindu temple accessible by cable car offering picturesque mountaintop views.
Sacred Hindu sanctuary featuring colorful statues, dedicated to the Goddess Maya
This Hindu shrine dedicated to the goddess symbolizing India has a map of the undivided country.
Har Ki Pauri is a famous ghat on the banks of the Ganges in Haridwar in the Indian state of Uttarakhand
Compact, remote temple dedicated to Lord Shiva and featuring smaller temples to other gods.
Replica of the Vaishno Devi Temple in Jammu and Kashmir, with caves and tunnels leading to the shrine.
